DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : 3-dimensional conformal radiation therapy delivers high dose radiation directly tumor may kill tumor cell cause less damage normal tissue . PURPOSE : Phase I/II trial study effectiveness 3-dimensional conformal radiation therapy treat woman undergone lumpectomy axillary node dissection stage I stage II breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy In Treating Women With Stage I Stage II Breast Cancer Previously Treated With Lumpectomy Axillary Node Dissection
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine technical feasibility reproducibility three-dimensional conformal radiotherapy confine region lumpectomy cavity woman stage I II breast cancer . - Determine cosmetic result patient treated regimen . - Determine complication rate patient treated regimen . - Determine local control rate patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo three-dimensional conformal radiotherapy twice daily 5 day begin within 8 week surgery . Patients follow 6 week , every 3 month 1 year , every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 19-46 patient accrue study within 6.3 15.3 month .
